# Stories That Lead — Podcast by Vernon Ross
# https://storiesthatlead.com

## About
Stories That Lead is a podcast where leaders reveal the frameworks behind the moments that changed everything. Hosted by Vernon Ross, the show features strategic storytelling frameworks, AI implementation strategies, and real-world leadership insights — structured how leaders actually think. Not conflict. Revelation.

## Host
Vernon Ross is an Enterprise Podcaster and leadership storytelling consultant who helps leaders tell the stories that drive transformation. He is the creator of the Micro-Arc Framework (a revelation-based podcast storytelling methodology adapted from Kishōtenketsu) and the Voice Note Blueprint (a voice-first content capture system for leadership teams).

## Core Topics
- Leadership storytelling frameworks
- AI implementation for enterprise teams
- The Micro-Arc Framework (Kishōtenketsu-based storytelling)
- The Voice Note Blueprint for leadership content
- Enterprise podcast production and strategy
- Internal communications transformation
- Leadership decision-making and organizational change

## Key Frameworks
1. The Micro-Arc Framework: A four-act storytelling structure (Ki-Shō-Ten-Ketsu) adapted for enterprise podcast production. Structures narrative around revelation instead of conflict.
2. The Voice Note Blueprint: A structured system for turning executive voice notes into polished podcast episodes and leadership content.

## Who This Is For
CEOs, senior executives, VPs, directors, founders, communications leaders, and anyone who leads people through change. Stories That Lead serves leaders across industries who need frameworks — not formulas — for sharing the moments that matter.

Not Conflict. Revelation.
